tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: How to create the workshop environment and connect to it using clone github in cloud-shell

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Prepare Target ATP
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Configure Extract Processes
tutorials.description: Create and configure extract processes at source

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Migrate to ATP
tutorials.description: Migrate your source database tables to target ATP

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Template to link to Need Help lab at the end of workshop. Change 'CHANGE-ME' in link below to need-help-livelabs.md or need-help-freetier.md
